name: Ian Mondragon-Shem
title: Assistant Professor
affiliation: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, UIC
bio: Ian Mondragon-Shem works at the interface of theoretical condensed matter physics and quantum information science. His research focuses on superconducting circuits, non-equilibrium quantum systems, and topological phases. Previously a postdoc at Northwestern, Argonne, and Yale.

name: Yash Rana
title: Graduate Researcher
affiliation: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, UIC
bio: Investigating protected superconducting qubits and circuit quantum electrodynamics.

name: Idden Tsai
title: Undergraduate Researcher
affiliation: Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering, UIC
bio: Investigating quantum batteries and developing quantum simulation software.
